main event: A bright white light was observed traveling from west to east in Baltimore, Maryland.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2 minutes,The object traveled in a flat trajectory without making any sound or leaving a trail,The object's brightness was compared to that of a star,There was no report of any known aircraft in the area at the time of the sighting,Weather conditions were clear with good visibility at the time of the observation.
sighted object: a bright white light in the sky
